actionConfiguration.body:
select  tdm.cd_id,  
		tdm.cd_no, 
		tdm.cd_name,
 		to_char(timezone('Asia/Kolkata',ctt.start_date),'dd/mm/yyyy')start_date ,
		to_char(timezone('Asia/Kolkata',ctt.end_date),'dd/mm/yyyy')end_date 
from public.topic_detail_master as tdm  
left join (select * from public.course_theory_track
		  where chapter_tag = {{Table1.triggeredRow.chapter_tag}} and section_id = {{section.selectedOptionValue}} ) ctt
on tdm.cd_id = ctt.cd_id and tdm.chapter_tag = ctt.chapter_tag
where tdm.chapter_tag = {{Table1.triggeredRow.chapter_tag}}
order by tdm.cd_id asc
